CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 很；极其；非常；更加；大量地；很大程度上
（与不可数名词连用，尤用于否定句和疑问句）大量；许多；很多；（与how连用询问数量）多少；多少钱
很大程度的；许多的；大量的

word_group.phrase: too much water drowned the miller

word_group.brief_definition: 远好于；远胜过；比...强得多
没什么区别, 差别不大
数量不多；没什么重要的

bilingual.source: Many dark days followed, and I missed her so much.
bilingual.target: 许多黑暗的日子接踵而至，我非常想念她。

bilingual.source: Many people ran to their local supermarkets to buy as much spaghetti as they could.
bilingual.target: 许多人跑到当地的超市尽可能多地购买意大利面。

bilingual.source: The light rain made the air much fresher.
bilingual.target: 小雨使得空气清新了许多。

bilingual.source: The drizzle has made the air much fresher.
bilingual.target: 毛毛雨让空气变得清新了许多。

bilingual.source: The Old Testament contains much ancient wisdom.
bilingual.target: 《旧约》包含了许多古老的智慧。

bilingual.source: The neo-liberal policies have sparked much debate.
bilingual.target: 新自由主义政策引发了许多争论。

bilingual.source: The old house retains much of its original charm.
bilingual.target: 这座老房子保留了许多原有的魅力。

bilingual.source: After the autumn rains, the air becomes much fresher.
bilingual.target: 秋雨过后，空气变得清新了许多。

bilingual.source: The glacial period shaped much of the Earth's surface.
bilingual.target: 冰川的时期塑造了地球表面的许多部分。

bilingual.source: Many people underestimate how much time a project will take.
bilingual.target: 许多人低估了一个项目所需的时间。

list.abstract: much（英[mʌtʃ]，美[mʌtʃ]），英语单词，作限定词为许多；大量；十分好的。作副词为很大程度上地；大量地；常常。短语搭配有too much（太多）。例句为“When Darrius was 10, he told his father that he liked piano music very much.（当达瑞斯10岁时，他告诉父亲他非常喜欢钢琴音乐。）” much副词类近义词有badly、extremely等，形容词类massive、名词类extensive，lots of、sea，相关反义词有little。比较级为more。最高级为most。

yingyinNormal.en: There's so much of place in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界上有许许多多的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I missed so much growing up in korea. What, like puberty?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在韩国长大，所以错过了许多乐趣。比如错过了发育期?

yingyinNormal.en: To give my future husband many sons, that is all I pray for. We shall talk much, Princess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只祈求，能为将来的夫君诞下许多子嗣。我们应该多聊聊，公主。

yingyinNormal.en: It is my pleasure, Dave. You know, there is so much misunderstanding about North Korea and, me personally.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的荣幸，戴夫，你知道，这世上对北韩，以及对我个人来说，有许多误解。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, as much as we've studied the brain, there's still a lot we don't know about dreams and their function. You know, even psychologists are divided on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然人类对大脑做过无数研究，但人类对梦与它的作用还是有许多不了解。心理学家们对它的解读也有分歧。

yingyinNormal.en: How much alcohol do you consume? Too much.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您每天喝多少酒？多的过头。
你怎么知道这值多少钱……
所有那些声音充满着痛苦。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 远好于；远胜过；比...强得多

examination_example.sentence: And placing too <highlight>much</highlight> emphasis on their opinions can ruin a fantastic home purchase.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过分强调他们的意见会毁掉一次美妙的购房体验。

examination_example.sentence: According to brain-scan experiments, the demands of so <highlight>much</highlight> decision-making quickly become too <highlight>much</highlight> for us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脑部扫描实验证明，如此大量的决策需求对我们来说很快就变得过多了。

examination_example.sentence: It has brought <highlight>much</highlight> benefit to the banking industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它给银行业带来了许多好处。

examination_example.sentence: The drive to discover is deeply rooted in humans, <highlight>much</highlight> the same as the basic drives for food or shelter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 探索的欲望深深根植于人类，这与他们寻求食物或住所的基本欲望非常相似。

examination_example.sentence: When we travel down a well-known route, because we don't have to concentrate <highlight>much</highlight>, time seems to flow more quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们行驶在一条熟悉的路线上时，由于我们不需要太专心，所以感觉时间好像流逝得更快。

examination_example.sentence: It constantly modifies and enhances the games you play to build on the strengths you are developing — <highlight>much</highlight> like an effective exercise routine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不断修改和优化你玩的游戏，以提高你正在开发的脑力——就像一项非常高效的日常锻炼。

word_usage.usage:
much可修饰形容词或副词的比较级或最高级，表示“更……；……得多”。例：
He is in a much better mood than usual. 
他的情绪比平时好多了。

much用作形容词的基本意思是“许多的”，常后接不可数名词。例：
I have got far too much work to do.
我要做的事太多了。

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: too much water drowned the miller

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: As the saying goes, too <highlight>much</highlight> water drowned the miller.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 常言道，过犹不及。

examination_example.sentence: In my view, overprotection and too <highlight>much</highlight> care are not beneficial to children's development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我看来，过度保护和过多的关心对孩子的发展是不利的。

examination_example.sentence: It is incredibly difficult to calculate how <highlight>much</highlight> dead stock currently goes to waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要计算出目前有多少死库存被浪费掉是极其困难的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: If people do not know how <highlight>much</highlight> they are eating, it can be really hard for them to stick to a diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果人们不知道自己吃了多少，他们就很难坚持节食。

examination_example.sentence: The nation's obesity level has <highlight>much</highlight> to do with calorie intake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个国家的肥胖水平与热量摄入有很大关系。

examination_example.sentence: She wanted to save <highlight>much</highlight> money as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她想尽可能多地存钱。

examination_example.sentence: Initially, kids learn numbers <highlight>much</highlight> like they learn letters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初，孩子们学习数字就像他们学习字母一样。

examination_example.sentence: According to some people living in San Jose, it has become <highlight>much</highlight> harder for the poor get ahead due to the increased inequality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据一些住在圣何塞的人说，由于不平等加剧，穷人想要出人头地变得更加困难。

examination_example.sentence: But they did <highlight>much</highlight> better after getting a good night's sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但他们在睡了一夜好觉后表现得好多了。

examination_example.sentence: His workload was <highlight>much</highlight> too heavy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的工作量太大了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: One was that I was amazed at the fact that a sick person could feel <highlight>much</highlight> better after seeing a doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其一，我对病人在看完医生后感觉好多了感到惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: He spent <highlight>much</highlight> of his childhood in France where he spent many hours each day outdoors painting pictures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他童年的大部分时间是在法国度过的，在那里他每天花很多时间在户外画画。

examination_example.sentence: I gave the owner as <highlight>much</highlight> information as possible and headed home to see what news the night might bring.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我把尽可能多的信息告诉了店主，然后回家看看晚上会有什么消息。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, I haven't got <highlight>much</highlight> sleep this past week, and I feel really tired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，在过去的一周我睡得很少，感觉很累。

examination_example.sentence: “Unless these sectors make their business models <highlight>much</highlight> more efficient digitally, they might be left behind, ” says Chetan Dube, UneeQ9s CEO.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “除非这些行业的商业模式在数字化方面更加高效，否则它们可能会被甩在后面。”UneeQ9s的首席执行官Chetan Dube表示。

examination_example.sentence: Why is it that some people are so <highlight>much</highlight> more intelligent or creative than the rest of us?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么有些人比我们其他人更聪明或更有创造力？

examination_example.sentence: In France, quality of life is <highlight>much</highlight> more important than efficiency (效率).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在法国，生活质量比效率重要得多。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: How <highlight>much</highlight> will the woman pay?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个女人要付多少钱？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Much</highlight> of the money has been spent building fine cities with lovely parks and lakes, and people live a comfortable life there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中大部分资金用于建设有可爱的公园和湖泊的美丽城市，人们在那里过着舒适的生活。

examination_example.sentence: knowledge as <highlight>much</highlight> as possible and keep improving myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽可能多地学习知识，不断提高自己。

examination_example.sentence: Now he is <highlight>much</highlight> happier and more outgoing than he used to be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在他比过去快乐多了，也更外向了。

examination_example.sentence: Friendship is <highlight>much</highlight> better than winning, isn't it?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 友谊比胜利要好得多，不是吗？

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly, the kite began to go higher, which made the son <highlight>much</highlight> happier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然，风筝开始飞得更高，这让儿子高兴多了。

word_usage.usage:
much还可以修饰比较级，此时表示程度，可以翻译“……比……得多”。
如：My apple is much bigger than yours.
我的苹果比你的大得多。
除了much之外，a little,even,still也可以用来修饰比较级。
